18 bool Node::operator==(const Node& other) const {
19  return X == other.X && Y == other.Y;
20 }
21 
22 bool Node::operator<(const Node& other) const {
23  if (X != other.X) return X < other.X;
24  return Y < other.Y;
25 }
26 
27 size_t std::hash<Node>::operator()(const Node& node) const {
28  return hash<double>()(node.X) ^ hash<double>()(node.Y);
29 }

31 void PathPlanning::AddEdge(const Node& from, const Node& to, double cost) {
32  graph[from].emplace_back(to, cost);
33 }
34 
35 void PathPlanning::AutumeticAddingEdge(const vector<Node>& AllNode) {
36  for (int i = 0; i < AllNode.size(); i++) {
37  for (int j = i + 1; j < AllNode.size(); j++) {
38  if (i != j
39  && abs(AllNode[i].X - AllNode[j].X) <= MaxDistanceNode
40  && abs(AllNode[i].Y - AllNode[j].Y) <= MaxDistanceNode)
41  {
42  AddEdge(AllNode[i], AllNode[j], 1.0);
43  AddEdge(AllNode[j], AllNode[i], 1.0);
44  }
45  }
46  }
47 }
48 
49 vector<Node> PathPlanning::ShortestPath(const Node& start, const Node& destination) {
50  unordered_map<Node, double> distance;
51  unordered_map<Node, Node> previous;
52  set<Node> visited;
53  priority_queue<pair<double, Node>, vector<pair<double, Node>>, greater<pair<double, Node>>> queue;
54 
55  for (const auto& pair : graph) {
56  distance[pair.first] = numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
57  }
58 
59  distance[start] = 0.0;
60  queue.emplace(0.0, start);
61 
62  while (!queue.empty()) {
63  double current_distance = queue.top().first;
64  Node current = queue.top().second;
65  queue.pop();
66 
67  if (visited.find(current) != visited.end())
68  continue;
69  visited.insert(current);
70 
71  if (current == destination)
72  break;
73 
74  if (graph.find(current) == graph.end())
75  continue;
76 
77  for (const auto& neighbor_weight_pair : graph[current]) {
78  Node neighbor = neighbor_weight_pair.first;
79  double weight = neighbor_weight_pair.second;
80  double altDistance = distance[current] + weight;
81  if (distance.find(neighbor) == distance.end() || altDistance < distance[neighbor]) {
82  distance[neighbor] = altDistance;
83  previous[neighbor] = current;
84  queue.emplace(altDistance, neighbor);
85  }
86  }
87  }
88 
89  vector<Node> path;
90  for (Node node = destination; ; node = previous[node]) {
91  path.push_back(node);
92  if (previous.find(node) == previous.end())
93  break;
94  }
95  reverse(path.begin(), path.end());
96 
97  return path;
98 }
99 
100 // Function to find the closest node to a given coordinate
101 Node PathPlanning::FindClosestNode(const std::vector<Node>& nodes, const Node& target) {
102  double minDistance = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
103  Node closestNode;
104 
105  for (const Node& node : nodes) {
106  double distance = std::sqrt(std::pow(node.X - target.X, 2) + std::pow(node.Y - target.Y, 2));
107  if (distance < minDistance) {
108  minDistance = distance;
109  closestNode = node;
110  }
111  }
112 
113  return closestNode;
114 }

116 void PathPlanning::DrawMap(const std::vector<Node>& locations, double precision) {
117  double minX = std::min_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.X < b.X; })->X;
118  double minY = std::min_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.Y < b.Y; })->Y;
119  double maxX = std::max_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.X < b.X; })->X;
120  double maxY = std::max_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.Y < b.Y; })->Y;
121 
122  for (double y = minY; y <= maxY; y += precision) {
123  for (double x = minX; x <= maxX; x += precision) {
124  if (std::any_of(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [x, y, precision](const Node& n) {
125  return std::abs(n.X - x) < precision && std::abs(n.Y - y) < precision;
126  })) {
127  std::cout << " * ";
128  } else {
129  std::cout << " . ";
130  }
131  }
132  std::cout << std::endl;
133  }
134 }
135 
136 void PathPlanning::DrawMapWithShortestPath(const std::vector<Node>& locations, const std::vector<Node>& shortestPath, double precision) {
137  double minX = std::min_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.X < b.X; })->X;
138  double minY = std::min_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.Y < b.Y; })->Y;
139  double maxX = std::max_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.X < b.X; })->X;
140  double maxY = std::max_element(locations.begin(), locations.end(), [](const Node& a, const Node& b) { return a.Y < b.Y; })->Y;
141 
142  int gridWidth = static_cast<int>((maxX - minX) / precision) + 1;
143  int gridHeight = static_cast<int>((maxY - minY) / precision) + 1;
144 
145  std::vector<std::vector<std::string>> grid(gridHeight, std::vector<std::string>(gridWidth, " ' "));
146 
147  for (const Node& location : locations) {
148  int x = static_cast<int>((location.X - minX) / precision);
149  int y = static_cast<int>((location.Y - minY) / precision);
150  grid[y][x] = " + ";
151  }
152  int i = 0;
153  for (const Node& location : shortestPath) {
154  int x = static_cast<int>((location.X - minX) / precision);
155  int y = static_cast<int>((location.Y - minY) / precision);
156  if (&location == &shortestPath.back()) {
157  grid[y][x] = " X ";
158  } else {
159  grid[y][x] = " " + std::to_string(i) + " ";
160  }
161  i++;
162  }
163 
164  for (int y = 0; y < gridHeight; y++) {
165  for (int x = 0; x < gridWidth; x++) {
166  std::cout << grid[y][x];
167  }
168  std::cout << std::endl;
169  }
170 
171 
172  std::cout << "STARTLOGGING" << std::endl;
173 
174 
175  // For logging
176  std::ofstream logFile("/home/pawarat/catkin_ws/src/Robotics-Studio-1/logs/path_log.txt", std::ios::app); // Open in append mode
177 
178  // Error checking for file opening
179  if (!logFile.is_open()) {
180  std::cerr << "Failed to open the log file." << std::endl;
181  return;
182  }
183  // Log the path
184  logFile << "Path from (" << shortestPath.front().X << "," << shortestPath.front().Y
185  << ") to (" << shortestPath.back().X << "," << shortestPath.back().Y << "):" << std::endl;
186 
187  logFile << "Shortest path " << std::endl;
188  for (const Node& node : shortestPath) {
189  logFile << "(" << node.X << "," << node.Y << ") ";
190  }
191  std::cout << std::endl;
192  std::cout << "\n";
193 
194  for (int y = 0; y < gridHeight; y++) {
195  for (int x = 0; x < gridWidth; x++) {
196  logFile << grid[y][x];
197  }
198  logFile << std::endl;
199  }
200 
201 
202  logFile << std::endl; // Add a blank line to separate different paths in the log
203  logFile.close(); // Always close the file when done
204 }
